text: The former chief executive of Ukraine's state-owned oil company, Andriy Kobolyev, has warned of a dramatic rise in European energy prices if the Russian destruction of Ukrainian energy infrastructure continues unabated. This is a clear example of how the ongoing conflict in Ukraine is having far-reaching consequences for the global economy. It's time for the international community to take action and support Ukraine in its efforts to defend its energy infrastructure and protect the livelihoods of its citizens."
